text:
Dears,
Looking at the doodle, I`m glad to tell you that there is interest in discussing about Wildsheet future and L-sheet communication in general!
The selected date for the Zoom meeting is

*Friday 17th March, from 3:00 to 4:00 pm (UK Time/GMT);* Zoom link below;

We`ll try to add/make cear the points of discussion/ideas before the meeting, but if you have any idea/comment that can be easy to pre-digest, feel free to post here.
See you in two weeks!

######

Time: Mar 17, 2023 03:00 PM London
